<template>
  .musicDe
</template>

<script>
import { Vue3Marquee } from "vue3-marquee";
import "vue3-marquee/dist/style.css";
export default {
  components: {
    Vue3Marquee,
  },
  mounted() {
    console.log(this.musicList);
  },
  props: ["musicList"],
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
.detailTop {
  margin: 0.3rem 0.2rem 0 0.2rem;
  .bgimg {
    z-index: -1;
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    filter: blur(0.6rem);
  }
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  .topLeft {
    display: flex;
    // flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-around;
    .icon {
      //   fill: white;
      width: 0.68rem;
      height: 0.68rem;
    }
    .sing {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      margin-left: 0.28rem;
      .vue3-marquee{
        width: 1.6rem;
      }
      p {
        color: white;
        display: inline-block;
        font-size: 0.34rem;
      }
      .singer {
        color: rgba(54, 54, 54, 0.8);
        font-size: 0.28rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        margin-top: 0.04rem;
        .singerIcon {
          fill: rgba(54, 54, 54, 0.8);
          width: 0.25rem;
          height: 0.25rem;
        }
      }
    }
  }
  .topRight {
    .icon {
      //   fill: white;
      width: 0.68rem;
      height: 0.68rem;
    }
  }
}
</style>
